title: IProjectionArrow.GetCoordinates
description: Gets the location of this projection arrow's line and its label.
returns: Array of 24 doubles containing starting and ending x,y,z points of the projection arrow and the x,y,z point for its label (see Remarks )
remarks: The doubles at indexes 0, 1, and 2 are the starting point of the projection arrow; the doubles at indexes 3, 4, and 5 are the ending point of the projection arrow. The doubles at indexes 21, 22, and 23 are the label location. All other doubles in the array are duplicates of these values.
